name: Latte
description: Freshly pulled shots of espresso with steamed non-fat milk and topped with thick foam.

name: Filter Coffee
description: For filter coffee, we generally follow the drip process, where hot water is added to the ground coffee beans and then allowed to drip in a pot. This is what makes us unique.

name: Americano
description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: Creamy soft-serve blended with milk and chocolate syrup. Garnished with whipped cream and rainbow sprinkles.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: The unmistakable summer flavor of strawberries, hand-spun into a rich and creamy milkshake.

name: Sahlep
description: Salep is a flour made from the tubers of the orchid genus Orchis. These tubers contain a nutritious, starchy polysaccharide called glucomannan. Salep flour is consumed in beverages and desserts, especially in the cuisines of the former Ottoman Empire, it is a traditional winter beverage.
